channel.title: Milestone 5 Requirements :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: For this milestone, you will be adding functionality to your Point-of-Sale system (POS). Specifically, we will be adding support for putting together an order and customizing the elements within it. To do this, we will be leveraging data binding. General requirements: You need to follow the style laid out in the C# Coding Conventions All classes should be declared in their respective namespace (see below) Document your classes using XML-Style comments
